ComicInfo.Summary:
Months have passed since Eleven defeated the Mindflayer by closing a gate to the Upside Downsaving her friends and probably the world. Life is rapidly changing for the young group of friends and despite all they have been through they are finding time to play D&D again. This time, new members are joining the party.
